duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to member mortgage and home equity loan inquiries via email, phone, and ticketing system with professional and well-documented communications.
Process mortgage and home equity loan transactions post-close, including payments, payoffs, and impound account maintenance.
Assist with real estate audits, insurance loss processes, and compliance with federal and local regulations.
Identify gaps in processes, report to leadership, and ensure compliance with rules and regulations.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma (Some experience in mortgage or home equity lending preferred)
